rules_text:
When this creature enters, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
When this creature dies, call The Beast. [i](You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“I grow weary of this world's nature.”
—Dr. Sevrox, research notes[/i]
